exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : V H : R (double (cons u v)) pi The term "u" has type "V" while it is expected to have type "orthogonal ?u ?v".
In environment v0 : V -> V H0 : forall u v : V, orthogonal u v -> orthogonal v u u, v : V H : R (double (cons u v)) pi Unable to unify "R (double (cons u v)) pi" with "orthogonal u (v0 v)".

original: { intros u v H. unfold orthogonal in H. apply (orthogonal_sym u (opp v)) in H. apply H. }
